text: ovun numbala samanga pitat va giye nam numbalata napura misa vena kisivak vardhanaya novannata tibuni. tavada numbala atara arbuda Ã¦ti kirimata mana balamin numbala atara (kelam) kiyannata tibuni. tavada ovunata savan dennan da numbala atara veti. aparadhakaruvan pilibanda allah sarva gnaniya
